======= SAMPLE GATEWAY COMMUNICATION MODULE ========
GGDF - GATEWAY DESCRIPTION FILES EXAMPLES
info:
# Sample GGDF (Generic Gateway Definition File)
The three sample GGDF uses the same format. If you have on of these Gateway availble,
you can test it using the following steps:
1. Edit the green:ish node (name : **IP Address for ..**) and set the IP address of the gateway (without http)
2. Don't forget to put the url to the description file in realKNX main UI (top left)
3. Then, click the blue inject button (name : Inject description file - ...) to generate a file & notifcation to Snips engine.
4. In Sample Implementations of Gateway Communication nodes, connect the corresponding **Respond from ..... UNIFI API** 
    to the flow. 
5. Then, start testing the voice control command "Hey Snips, turn on the light".

To create your GGDF, just edit one of the inject nodes.

# Description file's content
In the description file, there are type of functions
1. lights
2. dimmers
3. blinds
4. heating
5. scenes
6. sensor
7. aux (other)
